None.Name: Infused Immortal
None.Description:
Creates an aura that extends the life time of a Lost Souls Revenant. Within a 20m radius every Lost Revenant's life time will stop to run out and they deal 25% more damage. Upon leaving the
aura the hourglass will be reinstalled and remaining life time will again run out. Last for 15 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
